title: 求个1.2.5的联机JJ怪不会炸方块的插件
author: 疯狂小橙子

replies.author: SNIPER722
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 SNIPER722 于 2012-7-23 09:48 编辑 

我用到现在 最好的是
Safe-Creeper
他可以控制 JJ怪 小黑人 等等 所有的mob 都是可以控制的 比如比如让JJ怪出生爆炸但不损坏地面
让 黑人 出生 但拿不起方块 等等（这东西拆房子最可恶了）
Bukkit DEV：http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/safe-creeper/
下载：http://dev.bukkit.org/media/files/591/642/Safe_Creeper_1.1.zip

我的设置文件：# This is the global settings for all the worlds, if a world have his own settings file it will overwrite these settings for the world.

# Creepers (mob)JJ怪
CreeperControl:
    Enabled: true
    DestroyWorld: true
    EnableExplosionSound: true
    EnableExplosionSmoke: false
    CostumExplosionStrength:
        Enabled: false
        ExplosionStrength: 3
    Spawning:
        CanSpawnWithWorldGeneration: true
        CanSpawnNaturally: true
        CanSpawnFromSpawner: true
        CanSpawnFromSpawnerEgg: true
        CanSpawnFromOther: true
    CanTargetPlayer: true
    CanTargetMob: true
    DamagePlayers: true
    DamageMobs: true
    PoweredByLightning: true
    # Only enable these settings if you are between two levels (you must enable 'EnableBetweenLevels' to use it).
    EnableBetweenLevels:
        Enabled: false
        Levels: '0-256'

# Blazes (mob)火人
BlazeControl:
    Enabled: false
    Spawning:
        CanSpawnWithWorldGeneration: true
        CanSpawnNaturally: true
        CanSpawnFromSpawner: true
        CanSpawnFromSpawnerEgg: true
        CanSpawnFromOther: true
    CanLaunchProjectile: true
    CanTargetPlayer: true
    CanTargetMob: true
    DamagePlayers: true
    DamageMobs: true
    # Only enable these settings if you are between two levels (you must enable 'EnableBetweenLevels' to use it).
    EnableBetweenLevels:
        Enabled: false
        Levels: '0-256'

# Cave Spiders (mob)深渊蜘蛛
CaveSpiderControl:

        CanSpawnFromSpawner: true

        CanSpawnFromOther: true
    CanTargetPlayer: true

        Levels: '0-256'

# EnderDragon (mob)那个龙
EnderDragonControl:
    Enabled: true
    DestroyWorld: false
    EnableExplosionSound: true
    EnableExplosionSmoke: true
    Spawning:
        CanSpawnWithWorldGeneration: true
        CanSpawnNaturally: true
        CanSpawnFromSpawner: true
        CanSpawnFromSpawnerEgg: true
        CanSpawnFromOther: true
    CanTargetPlayer: true
    CanTargetMob: true
    DamagePlayers: true
    DamageMobs: true
    # Only enable these settings if you are between two levels (you must enable 'EnableBetweenLevels' to use it).
    EnableBetweenLevels:
        Enabled: false
        Levels: '0-256'

# Enderman (mob)小黑人
EndermanControl:
    Enabled: true
    CanPlaceBlock: false
    CanPickupBlock: false
    # If an endermen wants to pickup a block, and he can't, don't break the block but the endermen get a clone of that block in his hands
    CanCloneBlock: true
    # If an endermen wants to place a block, and he can't, don't place anything but remove the holding block out of his hands
    ClearHandsOnPlace: true
    Spawning:
        CanSpawnWithWorldGeneration: true
        CanSpawnNaturally: true
        CanSpawnFromSpawner: false
        CanSpawnFromSpawnerEgg: false
        CanSpawnFromOther: true
    CanTeleport: false
    CanTargetPlayer: true
    CanTargetMob: true
    DamagePlayers: true
    DamageMobs: true
    # Only enable these settings if you are between two levels (you must enable 'EnableBetweenLevels' to use it).
    EnableBetweenLevels:
        Enabled: false
        Levels: '0-256'

# TNT blocks (block)
TNTControl:
    Enabled: false

    EnableExplosionSound: true
    EnableExplosionSmoke: true
